Title: Cappuccino
Desc: A cappuccino is a coffee-based drink made primarily from espresso and milk

Title: Cappuccino
Desc: A cappuccino is a coffee-based drink made primarily from espresso with added white chocolate

title: Cappuccino
desc: A cappuccino is a coffee-based drink made primarily from espresso and steamed oatmilk

Title: Iced Cappuccino
Desc: An iced cappuccino is a coffee drink with espresso, milk, ice, and optional sweetener.

Title: Mocha Cappuccino
Desc: A mocha cappuccino is another name for a mocha or mocha latte: a drink made with espresso, steamed milk and chocolate.

Title: Mocha Cappuccino
